rooms.description: A spacious living and dining area with Art Deco accents featuring geometric patterns and bold colors.
Modern kitchen designed in Art Deco style with streamlined cabinets, chrome finishes, and a central island.
Compact servant quarters ensuring privacy and functionality, situated towards the rear of the plot for minimal intrusion.
Dedicated home office designed with Art Deco elements, featuring sound insulation and ample natural light.
Well-appointed bathroom designed in line with modern and Vastu principles ensuring a harmonious flow of energy.

openings.description: A grand entrance with Art Deco detailing to invite positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Large window facing West to allow natural light and ventilation in the living area.
Functional ventilation openings in the kitchen area.
